name: Color Survey Project (group project)
description: A website where the user picks their favorite and least favorite colors from a color picker and a results webpage is generated from the average picked colors of every user who ever visited the site.
technology: Made with Handlebars, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Sequilize and a SQL database, Node.js, Express, and Heroku.

name: MUZYLITICS (group project)
description: A website where the user enters a band name and gets Youtube links to 5 songs by related bands.
technology: Made with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, and Youtube and TasteDive's APIs

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A website where the user enters a city name and gets back the current weather and a 5 day forecast.
technology: Made with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, and the OpenWeather API

name: JavaScript Quiz Site
description: A website with a quiz that is kind of related to JavaScript.
technology: Made in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

name: Offline Budget PWA
description: A web app where the user can keep track of their budget, even when not connected to the internet
technology: Made with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Charts, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, manifests, and service-workers

name: Workout Tracker
description: A website where the user can add exercises and workouts and keep track of them over time
technology: Made with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Charts, SQL, Sequelize, Node.js, and Express
